The If-Match value to be used for optimistic concurrency. If is specified, the operation will be executed unconditionally. The If-Match value to be used for optimistic concurrency. If is specified, the operation will be executed unconditionally. If the value is specified, the operation will fail with a status of 412 (Precondition Failed) if the value of the entity in the table does not match.
Determines the behavior of the Update operation.
A controlling the request lifetime.
